tinygrad/tinygrad

minimal deep learning library that runs LLaMA and Stable Diffusion

Related repos

  • Scripts and tools for training and fine-tuning Stable Diffusion models
  • lightweight deep learning engine for mobile and edge devices
  • Open source toolkit for training diffusion image models with a simple web or command line interface—supports latest models, requires high-end Nvidia GPU
  • library for speeding up diffusion models
  • Toolkit for optimizing and deploying deep learning models across CPUs, GPUs, and NPUs
  • open-source diffusion engine for AI image and video generation
  • control diffusion models with extra conditions for image generation
  • Stable Diffusion inference on CPU
  • Curated list of deep learning tutorials, code, and communities
